pages.text: The game starts an automatic backup after a set interval, which is $(9)30 mins$() by default. When it happens it will hint you with a chat message. The system automatically deletes outdated backups and only keeps some recent ones.

You can find $(9)aroma1997/aromabackup.cfg$() in your config folder to adjust backup settings. To restore a backup, click on the 'Backup' button in world selection menu. Use $(9)/aromabackup$() command to initiate a manual backup.
